code: import React from'react';import formatDistanceToNow from'date-fns/formatDistanceToNow';import LikeButton from'./LikeButton';import Photo from'../../../components/shared/Photo';import'./Tweet.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Tweet=_ref=>{let{content,updatedAt,user,likes}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"tweet bordered",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Photo,{className:"tweet-photo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tweet-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tweet-name",children:user.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tweet-username",children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"tweet-separator",children:"\xB7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("time",{dateTime:updatedAt,children:formatDistanceToNow(new Date(updatedAt))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[content,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tweet-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LikeButton,{onLike:event=>console.log(event),likes:likes.length})})]})]})]});};export default Tweet;
